name: 'Queer as Folk' Quiz 2 | Queer As Folk | 15 Questions

questions.text: Where did David want Michael to move to?
questions.explanation:
Portland.

	Portland is where his son and ex-wife live, and David wanted to move back with Michael.

questions.text: Who was crowned King of Babylon?
questions.explanation:
Justin & Justin Taylor.

	Justin entered the contest to make Brian jealous, and no one was more surprised than Brian when Justin won!

questions.text: What was the theme of Emmett's goodbye party for Michael?
questions.explanation:
Flannel.

	Emmett (what a sweetie) chose lumberjacks for the theme because he figure that there would be lumberjacks up north in Portland, where Mikey and David were moving. He even glued faux pearls to his lumber jacket!

questions.text: Who did Brian lose his virginity to?
questions.explanation:
His gym teacher.

	Brian had forgotten his jock strap in the boys locker room, and when he came back to retrieve it, his gym teacher was showering. You know the rest.

questions.text: What celebrity did Brian and Michael have crushes on in high school?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Swayze.

	One time they were sitting in Mikey's room, looking at pictures of Patrick, and they started fooling around. But, of course, the moment was ruined when Deb walked in.

questions.text: What drug is Blake addicted to?
What is the name of the clothing store where Emmett worked?
What kind of music does Ted listen to?
What is the name of the Frenchman Lindsay was engaged to marry?
questions.explanation:
Guillaume.

	She was marrying him in order to legally allow him to remain in the U.S.A.

questions.text: Who is Justin's enemy at school?
questions.explanation:
Chris & Chris Hobbes & Chris Hobbs.

	On the season finale, Justin was attacked by Chris in the parking lot after the prom.

questions.text: What was the name of the guy Emmett met at Babylon on the night of the King of Babylon contest?
questions.explanation:
Brent.

	They met, were smitten with each other for about an hour, and then Brent broke poor Emmett's heart.

questions.text: What is the name of the girl at work that thought Michael was straight and had a crush on him?
questions.explanation:
Tracy.

	Brian outed Michael to Tracy, which caused a big fight between Brian and Michael.

questions.text: What colour was the scarf that Brian 'danced' with in the season finale?
Who does Daphne ask to be her first time?
questions.explanation:
Justin.

	She asks him, and he said OK, as long as she promised that things wouldn't get weird between them after. Things got weird.

Honeycutt & Honeycut.

	Isn't that a great name?
